Enum Class NumberFormat.Style

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<NumberFormat.Style>
java.text.NumberFormat.Style
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<NumberFormat.Style>, Constable
Enclosing class:
NumberFormat
public static enum NumberFormat.Style extends Enum<NumberFormat.Style>
A number format style.

Style is an enum which represents the style for formatting a number within a given NumberFormat instance.

Since:
12
See Also:
  • CompactNumberFormat
  • NumberFormat.getCompactNumberInstance(Locale, Style)
